name: Shure MV7+ Podcast Microphone
description: Professional podcast microphone with USB-C and XLR. Features new LED touch panel, Auto Level Mode, and legendary Shure sound. The podcaster's choice upgraded.

reviews.review_text: LED touch panel is so convenient. Game changer.
Shure quality speaks for itself. Sounds professional.
USB quality improved over original. XLR still better.
